About the Company: Maximaa Systems Ltd is pioneer and market leader in storage system and furniture. The product range of the company includes heavy duty racks, drive-in-storage systems, slotted angle rack, pallets, display racks, and mobile storage system. .The company also in the business activities of IT Division, Proyurveda Division, Storage System Division.
